oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mr. Howard's General Merchandise Store
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Interior view of Mr. Howard's General Merchandise Store. Glenn Earl Bonner (1912-1983), Garnet L. Clay (1896-1962) and David William Howard (1869-1951) are standing in the store. Glenn Bonner was Mr. Howard's son in law. Note the Dr. Pepper advertisement behind the left counter.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: General stores
